text: Oh mphrofethi! yithi emakhosikazini akho nasemadodakazini akho nasemakhosikazini amakholwa mabazemboze ngezembatho zabo (kusukela ekhanda kuya ezinyaweni), lokho kugcono kakhulu ukuze abesifazane (abakholwayo) baziwe bangahlushwa futhi ngasosonke isikhathi uMvelinqangi uyathethelela, unesihawu
